A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The plot holes in this movie really hurt my brain. \nI love 4\,5 and 6. I tried to forget 1\,2 and 3. But man I was excited for this after seeing what they did with Force Awaken but this really hurt to watch. It feels like someone watched a bunch of Star Wars clips on Youtube and wrote a script over it. The action is great. Space Battles amazing...... Story script and plot baffling. AND WHAT THEY DID WITH LUKE..... You ruined Luke Skywalker... Luke saved his Dad.. But had to kill Ben... why?
